column4: Hey guys, can I have some help building the new version of Pidgin?
best way is to grab the sources from debian and port them.

the tips (I did the backporting by hand) is to change the dependency from libnss3-dev to libnss-dev, remove the avahi-compat-howl-dev dependency and add --with-nss-includes=/usr/include/firefox/nss and --with-nspr-include=/usr/include/firefox/nspr
